sourcing.instructions:

- Germanium (Ge): Sourced from semiconductor manufacturers or suppliers.
- Scandium (Sc): Purchase from rare earth metal suppliers.
- Silicon (Si): Available from electronic component suppliers or general chemical suppliers.
